# editableTextArea

**Type Property**

An editable text area of the cell.

## Declaration

```swift
static var editableTextArea: NSCell.HitResult { get }
```

## Constants

- **contentArea**: A content area in the cell.
- **trackableArea**: A trackable area in the cell.
